System Design

System Architecture

Our website has classic model-view-controller pattern. Models include Patient model, Appointment model ,AdminTask models etc.
They contains grouped data from SQLite database. Each html page has a corresponding view class updating data needed for display. View class is used to handle user's request of displaying certain informations.
We use django forms Post methods to implement input features. Inputs from forms are send to view class and datas are sorted in views correspondingly. Other inputs including modifing database are sent to data models classes.

UML Object Diagram

This diagram is created to represent a specific website structure and responding mechanisms

Design priciples

MVC

One of the biggest advantage of model-view-controller design pattern is that it seperate concerns. By dividing project to parts, we reducde risks:modifications to certain parts would not affect whole project. It also allows developers to make progresses parallely at different sections,leading to faster development.

Entity Relationship Diagram

Database design is vital for our project since our core functionalities are to store,display and allow users to modify datas.
Below is a ER diagram showing Relationships between each data types.

Sequence Diagram

Our website is embedded with multiple functionalities. We aim to allow users to access features smoothly and intuitively so that they have good user experience. We designed this sequence diagram to represent typical users with different needs and how they would intereact with our website.
